moratuwa egodauyane sunandopanandaramadhipathi matigahathanne wimalawansa himipanange ghathanaya sambandhayen rakshitha bandhanagara gatha kara sitina moratuwa niyojya nagaradhipathi sujith pushpakumara namathi sakakaruta apa niyama karana lesa illamin gonukara thibu apa pethsamak panadura mahadhikarana winisuru sarojani kusala wirawardhana mahathmiya eeye (09) prathikshepa kalaya.sakakaruge biriya idiripath kala apa pethsama gana wimasimak kirimen pasuwa winisuruwariya prakasha kele wimalawansa himiyange ghathanaya pilibandawa kolambaa kottasaye aparadha parikshana anshaya pawathwu parikshanaya anuwa ghathanaya sidu kirimata aadhara anubala dima saha kumanthranaya kirima pilibanda sakakaru wu sujith pushpakumara namaththata erehiwa sakki athi bawaya.ohuta apa niyama kaloth yalith moratuwa pradeshaye kalabala athi wimata ida athi bawath sakkikaruwanata balapam kirimata ida athibawath nithipathiwaraya wenuwen adhikaranayata karunu idiripath kala rajaye nithignya chamalka samarasinha mahathmiya kiya sitiyaya.wiharadhipathi ghathanaya sidu wu dina rathri sakakara sujith pushpakumara, danata athadanguwata pathwa sitina sakakaruwan samanga durakathana sakachcha pawathwa thibena bawa anawaranaya we.

paksha prathipaththi prakashanayeth anura kumara.atham wita, oya widiyata, pakshaya wenuwata nayakaya wa pimbima, maha mathiwaranaye di ma arambaune, anura kumara ta erehiwa aniwaryayen ma, pakshaya thulin wirodhaya mathu wenakota, pakshayata wada nayakaya wadagath kiyana tharkaya ta kalthaba padanamak goda nagima sandaha ma wiya hakiyi.me welawe, anura kumara saha aanduwa athara ayi hondayiya hethuwen, jawipe thulin anura kumara gana mathuwa athi wirodhaya ta, piliyamak lesin, pakshaya ta wada anura kumara wadagath kiyana mathaya pathirawenne, ehima diguwak lesin pamana yi.

onna ethanin dawasak dekak giya thana kammule , kata wage diwa , widurumahe punchi punchi rathu pata bibili (alpenethi wala hisa tharame ) athi wenawa , thawa paya kihiyak yathdi ee wage bibili alle yata paththe pathule wagema lingaya pradeshayeth athi wenna puluwan , patawunge nam thattam walath me bibila enawa , ee rathu pata bibila kasanne naha , eeth eka langa bibili gananawak hadena nisa harima wedanakariya , me nisama pera pasal wayase daruwan tikak nosansun , kalabalakari gathiyakuth penwanawa ,me bibila kadila thuwala aawama wedanawa thawath wadiyi .
